name: PingBol
description:
Welcome to PingBol! 

Playing this game could not be more simple! 

Tap the screen to shoot a ball to try to hit another ball. Hit another ball 5 times to destroy it and gain 1 point. 

When your ball stops, it will expand to fill the available space. 

Be careful, if a ball hits the red line, you lose a life (you get an extra life every 5 points) 

Good luck! 

(PingBol is inspired by 'Gimme Friction Baby' by Wouter Visser)
